price: (43) And whoever is patient and forgives - indeed, that is of the matters [worthy] of resolve.[1426]
arabic: وَلَمَن صَبَرَ وَغَفَرَ إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ لَمِنۡ عَزۡمِ ٱلۡأُمُورِ
footnotes: [1426]- On the part of those seeking the reward of Allāh.
